alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 05 at 1:41AM CDT until November 05 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Sunflower County in northwestern Mississippi... Northern Bolivar County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 140 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Rosedale, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Gunnison around 150 AM CDT. Deeson around 200 AM CDT. Shelby around 205 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Alligator, Winstonville, Beulah, Pace, Duncan and Merigold. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northwestern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
